name: Let Them Come

minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.2Ghz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: This game is locked to 30 frames per second.
